overview: Susan’s life read like the t.v. script for Paradise.  She was young, healthy, beautiful, owned a two-million-dollar home in Malibu and was married to handsome Ted Arrowsmith, producer of television’s most popular nighttime show.  What more could any woman ask for?  But, television is just make-believe and when Susan woke up, it was to betrayal, infidelity and loneliness.  Happiness was just a dream remembered, before the final fadeout.
title: A Lover For Susan
